statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE product_id = 789 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE transaction_amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' AND transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_category, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking GROUP BY product_id, product_category HAVING COUNT(product_id) > 1;

SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM CustomerBehaviorTracking WHERE transaction_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY product_category ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT behavior_type, transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_id, behavior_type FROM CustomerBehavior ORDER BY behavior_type DESC;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM PersonalizedMarketing WHERE campaign_status = 'active';
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, behavior_type, transaction_id FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND behavior_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY customer_id ASC, transaction_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_spent FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'purchase' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY max_transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT cb.customer_id, pm.campaign_name, pm.campaign_type, cb.transaction_amount FROM CustomerBehavior AS cb JOIN PersonalizedMarketing AS pm ON cb.customer_id = pm.customer_id WHERE pm.campaign_status = 'active' ORDER BY cb.customer_id, cb.transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Customer WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Transaction;
SELECT customer_name, email, age, gender FROM Customer WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customer WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp, amount FROM Transaction WHERE amount < 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, age, gender FROM Customer WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email, phone FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, purchase_date FROM PurchaseHistory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE registered_at > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE registered_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM Transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;

SELECT Customers.name AS customer_name, Products.product_name AS purchased_product FROM Customers JOIN PurchaseHistory ON Customers.id = PurchaseHistory.customer_id JOIN Products ON PurchaseHistory.product_id = Products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_budget > 5000;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, category, preference_level FROM customer_preferences WHERE category='Clothing';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC;

SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM customer_profiles cp JOIN purchases p ON cp.id = p.customer_id JOIN transactions t ON p.purchase_id = t.purchase_id GROUP BY cp.first_name, cp.last_name ORDER BY total_amount_spent DESC;

SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, COUNT(p.purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM customer_profiles cp LEFT JOIN purchases p ON cp.id = p.customer_id GROUP BY cp.first_name, cp.last_name HAVING total_purchases > 5;

SELECT cp.first_name, cp.last_name, MAX(fp.preference_level) AS max_preference_level FROM customer_profiles cp LEFT JOIN customer_preferences fp ON cp.id = fp.customer_id GROUP BY cp.first_name, cp.last_name;

SELECT mc.campaign_name, mc.start_date, mc.end_date, SUM(p.price) AS total_revenue FROM marketing_campaigns mc JOIN purchases p ON mc.campaign_id = p.purchase_id GROUP BY mc.campaign_name, mc.start_date, mc.end_date ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
